name: MSR WindBurner Stock Pot 4.5L
description: Increase your feasting capacity by adding this big pot to an MSR WindBurner Stove. This large-volume pot is great for families and groups or for melting snow. Nests with stove system components and other WindBurner cookware.4.5 L pot is hard anodized aluminum, with fixed handles for easy lifting.Aluminum strainer lid has locking hatches for safe and easy straining.Integrated heat exchanger encloses heating element, ensuring rapid boil times no matter what the wind is doing.Nests with other MSR Windburner Group Stove System items.110g fuel canister (sold separately) nests perfectly inside.Only works with MSR WindBurner Stove (not the WindBurner Personal Stove System)
